FuncDef: The display netstream command displays the NetStream configurations. The display netstream command displays the NetStream configurations.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays all the NetStream configurations, including:
NetStream configurations in the system view.NetStream configurations in the flexible flow statistics view.NetStream configurations in the interface view.
-

Displays the global NetStream configurations, including:NetStream configurations in the system view.NetStream configurations in the flexible flow statistics view.
-

Displays the NetStream configurations on a specified interface.
The parameter <interface-type> <interface-number> specifies the interface type and number.
-
-

Displays the NetStream configurations on a specified interface.
The parameter <interface-name> specifies the name of an interface.
-
